name: Galaxy Innovations Inc
description: Developer of a marketing platform designed to provide experts in performance advertisement. The company's platform provides instant access to teams, shares cross-departmental insights, monitors project timelines, and tracks goals, enabling clients with instant access to vetted marketing experts and teams for monthly projects.
